node.title: registration
node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `registration` ( `from_user` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `for_registry` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `in_user_profile` int(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `tstamp` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `data` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `comments` varchar(512) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`for_registry`,`from_user`), KEY `registry` (`for_registry`), KEY `user` (`from_user`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci
